Posts.Content: Tomorrow wow! I really hope all is ok with u! I am scared of the tests too. I heard today I should get a call tomorrow or Fri to book an app. So hopefully I will get seen next week. Its a week today since I found the lump and I can't stop feeling it now lol! I keep going from being ok about it to getting worried again. Guess we don't know till we get results . Will be thinking of u tomorrow, I really hope its good news, please do let me know! Big hugs x b brave!
Posts.Title: large lump and urgent referral... only 29?!

Posts.Content: Hi, sorry to hear Ur in the same boat too :-( where abouts are u from? I still haven't heard about referral yet but doc said it should b within 2 weeks. Have u got a date? X
Posts.Title: large lump and urgent referral... only 29?!

Posts.Content: I've had a real bad day with worry today :-( I've been thinking of u tonight, I really hope all is ok xx
Posts.Title: large lump and urgent referral... only 29?!

Posts.Content: I'm 29 and recently found a large egg size lump in the bottom of my breast. I have no idea how long it has been there as even afew hrs before I found it, I didn't notice it when I took a shower. I went to the doc the next day. After examining me she said normally they are not allowed to refer someone of my age, I would have to wait a month and if it was still there go bk and get refered then. However she said in my case she wanted to do an urgent referal right away! Now I'm really anxious! I know I'm young so the odds r in my favor, but I'm really worried now! Any other young women had lumps on here?
Posts.Title: large lump and urgent referral... only 29?!

Posts.Content: Sorry u have to have a core topsy, they sound bad :-( hoping its all ok for u, at least they are covering all bases and u will know soon. I haven't heard anything yet, doc said they could well push ny referral to the bk of the Que because of my age. I bet I don't get an appointment for weeks :-( I'm so stressed out with the waiting! What is Ur lump like out of interest? Mine is about egg size and feels very irregular/ strangely shaped and hard. It doesn't hurt unless my son elbows me lol. My nipple has started to get v sensitive tho. Hope I hear soon the wait is driving me crazy ! At least in afew days u will have Ur answer. Hope its good news! Xx
Posts.Title: large lump and urgent referral... only 29?!

Posts.Content: Hiya Hun how did Ur follow up app go? I finally have my app booked for weds morning so not too much longer to wait. Hopefully I will have good news too! X
